fields.name: EventHubAuthorizationRuleId
fields.description: The resource Id for the event hub authorization rule.

fields.name: EventHubName
fields.description: The name of the event hub. If none is specified, the default event hub will be selected.

fields.name: MarketplacePartnerId
fields.description: The full ARM resource ID of the Marketplace resource to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.

fields.name: ServiceBusRuleId
fields.description: The service bus rule Id of the diagnostic setting. This is here to maintain backwards compatibility.

fields.name: StorageAccountId
fields.description: The resource ID of the storage account to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs.

fields.name: WorkspaceId
fields.description: The full ARM resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace to which you would like to send Diagnostic Logs. Example: /subscriptions/4b9e8510-67ab-4e9a-95a9-e2f1e570ea9c/resourceGroups/insights-integration/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/viruela2
